name: Ghost#Dialer Demo
description:
Ghost-Users? Wisemen? Strega? What are these girls gunna do?

In response to the oppressive system around them, two high-schoolers create a space for themselves. A secret after-school club where they can explore and express themselves without judgment. Sharing sunsets together, playing JRPGs, and falling in love.

Until they realize that they're ensnared in a tangled web of self-hatred, woven by the venomous adults around them. A mysterious number reveals to Kite, our protagonist, the path that they need to break free. Kite isn't sure who they can trust, only knowing that they have to move forward. A proclamation of love leading into a dangerous adventure against unknown forces.

Ghost#Dialer is a supernatural mystery about discovering our truths, and discovering the power we all possess inside of us. How we can manifest our truest selves and wield that power against those that would deny our humanity.

If you enjoy the demo and would like to support me in finishing the full game, please consider donating to my ko.fi~! I'm creating this game single-handedly in my spare time so any support is much appreciated: https://ko-fi.com/petrianthe
